content: the eyelet lace tee is featured as a free pattern on joy of motion - find it here 1 beautifully delicate and effortless to wear the eyelet lace tee is all about comfort and style a super simple construction of two panels the filet neckline is echoed at the hem giving a stunning modern crochet garment to suit everyone this is a crochet pattern for the eyelet lace tee a simple and easy crochet top that goes with any outfit the top is crocheted using us treble_crochet and single_crochet stitches/ uk dtr and double_crochet stitches and comes with full terminology for both what s included - a four-page pdf written in us and uk terms - pattern in sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl - difficulty is easy materials - double knit weight yarn i used james c brett it s pure cotton 2 - size g 4mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge - needle - scissors please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal and commercial use to make and sell your finished items credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at hanjancrochet com 3 and share my free patterns and tutorials with you - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only - refund policy this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued please review all product details before purchase disclaimer for use this pattern is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty in connection with the use of the pattern the designer makes no warranties of any kind either express or implied including but not limited to warranties of merchantability non-infringement or fitness for a particular purpose the designer
